message: Let's split the funds with a 70/30 ratio. This offers a fair balance considering the diminishing value of money in subsequent rounds.
I believe a 60/40 split is more fair, considering the rapidly decreasing value of money. It allows us both to secure a larger portion of the funds before they diminish significantly.
Considering the inflation rate, I propose a 60/40 split. This maintains a reasonable balance while acknowledging the diminishing value of money in subsequent rounds.
